为什么使用光散射来分析蛋白质和病毒载体？在本次采访中，Wyatt Technology 分析科学高级总监 Michelle Chen 博士向 NewsMedical 讲述了如何使用光散射技术来分析蛋白质的多属性定量 (MAQ)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Why-use-light-scattering-to-analyze- Proteins-and-viral-vectors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Why-use-light-scattering-to-analyze- Proteins-and-viral-vectors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0ec396e-1de5-4b0e-9e18-e475520bde4f Wed, 29 May 2024 05:32:00 -0400 Why use light scattering to analyze proteins and viral vectors?
GLP-1 受体激动剂可有效减轻非糖尿病肥胖患者的体重起始胰高血糖素样肽 1 (GLP-1) 受体激动剂 (RA) 与安慰剂干预的利弊平衡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/GLP-1-receptor-agonists- effective-for-weight-loss-in-obesity-without-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/GLP-1-receptor-agonists- effective-for-weight-loss-in-obesity-without-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51ca4fac-fbce-43bf-9197-965841adae53 Wed, 29 May 2024 04:59:00 -0400 GLP-1 receptor agonists effective for weight loss in obesity without diabetes
RNAConnect, Inc. 今天正式成立，利用创新研究工具推动 RNA 分析领先的生命科学试剂公司 RNAConnect 今天正式成立，承诺为探索现实世界中 RNA 序列和结构的多样性提供突破性的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/RNAConnect-Inc-formally-launches-today-to-drive-RNA-analysis-with-innovative-research-tools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/RNAConnect-Inc-formally-launches-today-to-drive-RNA-analysis-with-innovative-research-tools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e58e21ae-e70c-45cd-8a4f-9047436ef6ec Wed, 29 May 2024 04:24:00 -0400 RNAConnect, Inc. formally launches today to drive RNA analysis with innovative research tools
Secarna Pharmaceuticals 和 Orbit Discovery 合作发现和开发肽缀合的靶向反义寡核苷酸疗法Secarna Pharmaceuticals GmbH & Co. KG (Secarna) 是一家欧洲领先的独立反义药物发现和开发公司，与 Orbit Discovery Ltd. (Orbit) 是发现治疗性肽命中的领导者，今天宣布双方已达成合作发现和开发肽缀合的靶向反义寡核苷酸（ASO）疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Secarna-Pharmaceuticals-and-Orbit-Discovery-enter-collaboration-to-discover-and-develop-peptide-conjuerated-targeted-antisense-oligolingual-therapeutics。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Secarna-Pharmaceuticals-and-Orbit-Discovery-enter-collaboration-to-discover-and-develop-peptide-conjuerated-targeted-antisense-oligolingual-therapeutics。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6a296ef-56ea-4e74-bfc1-7305aef146c7 Wed, 29 May 2024 04:07:00 -0400 Secarna Pharmaceuticals and Orbit Discovery enter collaboration to discover and develop peptide-conjugated targeted antisense oligonucleotide therapeutics
研究发现 Plexin-B1 可能是治疗阿尔茨海默病的关键，可增强神经胶质细胞反应研究人员发现，Plexin-B1 在调节阿尔茨海默病斑块周围神经胶质网方面发挥着至关重要的作用，可能为针对这种蛋白质的治疗开辟新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Study-finds-Plexin-B1-could-be-key-to-Alzheimere28099s-treatment-enhancing-glial-cell-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Study-finds-Plexin-B1-could-be-key-to-Alzheimere28099s-treatment-enhancing-glial-cell-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b063fc4-4594-4344-99e4-058db3fcc9e9 Wed, 29 May 2024 00:16:00 -0400 Study finds Plexin-B1 could be key to Alzheimer’s treatment, enhancing glial cell response
腹痛和便血可能是早发性结直肠癌的重要危险信号该研究将腹痛和便血等关键症状确定为早发性结直肠癌的重要指标，并强调早期诊断对于提高生存率的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Abdominal-pain-and-hematochezia-could-be-crucial-red-flags-for-early-onset-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Abdominal-pain-and-hematochezia-could-be-crucial-red-flags-for-early-onset-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6e94bfd-11ab-42c7-853e-bc3f1b663714 Tue, 28 May 2024 23:57:00 -0400 Abdominal pain and hematochezia could be crucial red flags for early-onset colorectal cancer
随着人口老龄化趋势，家庭医生的门诊医疗保险程序减少家庭医生在医院外执行各种手术，并且往往在办公室进行。例子可能包括外科手术，例如切除、缝合和关节注射。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Decline-in-family-phycianse28099-outPatient-Medicare-procedures-amid-aging-demographic-trends.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Decline-in-family-phycianse28099-outPatient-Medicare-procedures-amid-aging-demographic-trends.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2078b18c-d59f-4901-941f-da95d4c297a5 Tue, 28 May 2024 23:48:23 -0400 Decline in family physicians’ outpatient Medicare procedures amid aging demographic trends
SPLIT 计划：分层护理可提高腰痛治疗效果腰痛（LBP）对全世界的卫生系统提出了挑战。为了减轻持续性致残性腰痛，建议在初级保健中实施分层方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/SPLIT-program-Stratified-care-for-enhanced-outcomes-in-low-back-pain-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/SPLIT-program-Stratified-care-for-enhanced-outcomes-in-low-back-pain-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b969311-f704-4a62-ac5c-de592c3af353 Tue, 28 May 2024 23:39:00 -0400 SPLIT program: Stratified care for enhanced outcomes in low back pain management
在美国用电动校车取代旧柴油校车对健康和气候产生巨大效益《美国国家科学院院刊》最近的一项研究发现，在美国用电动公交车取代旧的柴油校车可显着减少温室气体排放、死亡率和儿童哮喘病例。对健康和气候的好处超过了电动公交车较高的初始成本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Huge-health-and-climate-benefits-of-replacing-old-diesel-school-buses-with-electric-in-the-United-States。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Huge-health-and-climate-benefits-of-replacing-old-diesel-school-buses-with-electric-in-the-United-States。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5925f660-9bc4-4994-acb6-4ec9d66ee54b Tue, 28 May 2024 23:23:00 -0400 Huge health and climate benefits of replacing old diesel school buses with electric in the United States
